channel.title: Grassroots on Klinkenberg
channel.description: Recent content in Grassroots on Klinkenberg

item.title: 3D tracked knowledge video
item.description: It’s that time of the year again. the grass is turning green and so, it’s time for a new grassroots project. This time I’m going to dive into the word of 3D tracking in Adobe After Effect to create next level knowledge videos. I was inspired by the awesome Peter McKinnon and his short tutorial on how to merge 3D graphics and video footage. I thought, how cool would it be to explain some statistical concepts and have it play out right in front of me on the table.
